name: Gary Breil
title: Budtender
coverLetter:
Dear Sir,


I have no experience, but I'm very eager to learn everything I need to

know. I have passed my Worker Permit test, but have not received it yet

because the OLCC is backed up as you probably already know this. But they

said I can work in a Dispensary while they're getting my Permit done. I have

a copy of the Temporary Worker Permit if you'd like to see it.
experience:
Goodwill ----- worked 2 yrs. Was a lead Warehouse worker.

Grocery Outlet ------ worked 2 yrs. Was the Lead Grocery Freight Stocker.
